content: Thanks dave for your article.Im from kenya and facing many difficultis in finding a place or community to nurture my ideas or prototype into startups.Seemilingly,you are luck to get into YC.Iwould like to apply as a minority.Would i send you a sampl of my application and review it before submiting it.However i dont seem to find a link for Y Combinator Founders of Color.Please send me the link for the internal group “YCFOC”.Sincerely,Moses.
